title: The Rickety Elevator

panel_structure.description: Architect delicately holds a glowing mushroom like examining a universe seed, mycelial networks pulsing with connections to invisible realms, pot containing swirling galaxies of potential experiences
Wooden elevator appears, creaking and held by fraying neural cables, shaft descending through layers of consciousness each more surreal, Architect's reflection showing infinite recursive selves

transformation_notes: The mushroom becomes a key to consciousness exploration, while the rickety elevator metaphor captures both the promise and peril of descending into altered states of awareness.
